name: weighted_statistics
abstract: High-performance weighted statistics functions for sparse data
description: A PostgreSQL extension providing weighted mean and quantile functions optimized for sparse data where sum(weights) < 1.0 implies implicit zeros. Offers 3-10x performance improvement over PL/pgSQL implementations through C optimization.

weighted_statistics.abstract: High-performance weighted statistics functions for sparse data

X_comment: This extension provides weighted statistical functions optimized for sparse datasets commonly found in risk assessment, survey analysis, and incomplete data scenarios.
